topic.title: CS Lunch & Townhall
topic.text:
12pm-12:30ish
Physical Computer Center (PCC)

Evans LIB 2708

Curious about the future of our Computer Science department and what courses are in store for next year? Join us for an engaging session with Paul and Richard, who will be presenting and seeking feedback on departmental hiring and winter course options. Bring your thoughts and ideas to shape the direction of our collective learning experience. Sandwich and pizza lunch will be provided.

Meeting will be streamed here

https://evergreen.zoom.us/j/83083474292

and then recorded to Panopto later.

 

Please answer some questionnaire questions here according to your interests:
https://github.com/TheEvergreenStateCollege/upper-division-cs/blob/main/dsa-23au/notes/docs/week-09/Co-Creation-09.md
